https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7XiuHrei34vUqapme7CNa63Czk6.jpg Deb and Kabita are in love but when Deb's best friend, Arun, meets with an accident, he assumes Kabita to be his lover, Kajol. Later, when Kajol dies, Deb and Kabita decide to sacrifice their love. Chaowa Pawa
